title: DJIâ€™s unannounced Mini 3 Pro gets unboxed early in new video
content:
DJI’s unannounced Mini 3 Pro drone is probably one of the worst-kept secrets. Over the past couple of months, there have been several leaks of the drone, showing off its exterior, included accessories, and even a full rundown of its specifications. A new video gives us our first unboxing experience of the drone, which is

The post DJI’s unannounced Mini 3 Pro gets unboxed early in new video appeared first on XDA.
description: A new unboxing video gives us our best look yet a DJI's unannounced Mini 3 Pro. The drone is expected to be announced on May 10.
